    Guanyi Chen

    I am a PhD student in Computing Science, University of Aberdeen, working on Natural Language Generation. I am supervised by Prof. Kees van Deemter and Dr. Chenghua Lin.

    • Abderdeen, Scotland
    • University of Aberdeen

    Mini NLP and ML Reading Group@Aberdeen

    Abbreviations

    • JM2 = Daniel Jurafsky and James H. Martin (2009). Speech and Language Processing (2nd Edition). Prentice Hall.
    • JM3 = Daniel Jurafsky and James H. Martin (2017). Speech and Language Processing (3rd Edition draft).
    • DM = David J. C. MacKay (2003). Information Theory, Inference and Learning Algorithms
